results.title: Preparation and Safety Evaluation of Topical Simvastatin Loaded NLCs for Vitiligo
results.text_hl: However, recent studies have demonstrated an immunosuppressive effect on @<m>DISEASE_606579</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:606579 @@@vitiligo lesions@@@ in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ models by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.
